column2: This district overlays the Rural Residential 5, Rural Residential 10, and Conservation 25 districts. The permitted and conditional uses in the underlying Districts are all conditional uses within this overlay area.
column4: New principal structures are prohibited in the overlay.
column6: All uses remain the same, except setbacks now require 75 feet from the shoreline for all structures except boathouses, piers, docks, and floats.
